item.description:
Come Contra dancing and listening to various acoustic music in Bethany at this regular dance location!

http://www.bethanymus...

It goes until 3am (although I won't be staying that late).  It is free, but you must bring a dessert or beverage (alcoholic or not) to share.

Contra dancing is a "called" social folk dance descended from English and French country dancing. You will dance with a LOT of other people during the course of the night. No experience needed, they walk you through what you need to do. It is not too physically demanding, and it is fun!

HOST: Jason, cell # in my RSVP
item.name: Fri. 11/25 - Contra dancing! (no experience needed)
